product_name: SmartWool PhD Outdoor Ultra-Light Crew Socks - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for those short to mid-length hikes, the SmartWool PhD Outdoor Ultra-Light Crew Socks blend a high-performance fit with select ultralight cushioning to keep your feet happy. Blend of merino wool and nylon with elastane for stretch and fit. Soft, nonirritating merino wool insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. 4 Degree Elite(TM) fit system uses two elastics for greater stretch and recovery to keep the sock in place. ReliaWool(TM) technology in high-impact areas provides longer lasting protection to keep feet comfortable. Padded Achilles tab offers extra comfort. Mesh ventilation zones manage temperature and moisture. Toes are durable and virtually seamless. SmartWool PhD Outdoor Ultra-Light Crew Socks have a height of 8.5 in. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for those short to mid-length hikes, the SmartWool PhD Outdoor Ultra-Light Crew Socks blend a high-performance fit with select ultralight cushioning to keep your feet happy.
